title: Get paid to surf ...again ...really
body: <p>Remember alladvantage? See <a href="http://mediagab.com/blog/archive/2005/02/22/1018.aspx" title="Get paid to surf!!!">Ralph's post on the hook-up</a>. Sign up with <a href="http://www.surfjunky.com/?r=travis" title="http://www.surfjunky.com/?r=travis">http://www.surfjunky.com/?r=travis</a> so I get the referral bling action. (<del>watch out for the focus grabbing on forms though, especially password fields, etc.</del> nevermind, just make sure you set the options that Ralph mentions in his post)</p><p>Also, if you have gmail, you might want to sign up with gmail.username+surfjunky@gmail.com so that you can easily filter any incoming mail from them (in case they decide to start spamming).</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2005-02-22
